DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate transcranial Direct Current Stimulation ( tDCS ) effective recovery postural control stroke rehabilitation .
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation Stroke Rehabilitation
DOC.detailed_description: The patient divide 2 group randomisation procedure . All patient participate 2 month study . Group 1 receive true tDCS first month follow SHAM stimulation second month . Group 2 receive SHAM first month true stimulation follow month . Four stimulation 20minutes provide 4 week change stimulation intensity .
